file_content.text: Warning! Security lockdown in process.
Open prisoner files for Kanjon Slyke, Chaney Barrow, Ohta and Paarkos. Disable cell fail-safes.
[Slice the computer]
Cell fail-safes disabled. Defenses will not be activated in case of breach.
Open communications link.
You're one of them, now. Let them know who they're dealing with.
You have their attention. Tell them who you are.
Let's see you establish your criminal credibility.
They're waiting to hear from you. Who will you be today?
Link open to selected prisoners.
Pay attention. I have an offer to make.
We're doing a job together.
Right now you're rotting in jail. Riots go bad, you could even starve to death.
But I'm putting together a job, and I need good people. Your freedom's an advance on the pay.
Listen up, all of you. Half the prison is in chaos, but no one's escaped yet. The Republic's locked this planet down.
I can help free you.
I have a plan to get out. Play your cards right, you can be part of it.
I know you're listening, you little wastes. I know you want out. But I free you, I own you. You work for me and die for me.
I'm your worst nightmare.
Do your jobs well, maybe I reward you. Join the riots, go after the Republic... I get unhappy.
Doors blow in ten seconds. Look for the meeting place on your holomap. I expect you to be there.
Hope they bought it.
The electrons are singing.
I hope they all survived that.
Let's hope they all kept their distance from the doors.
Scorpio Sanctions activated.
That was a very articulate speech, but you chose your audience poorly. For example, Chaney Barrow is only the third-best slicer on Belsavis.
I have now killed the other two.
Show yourself. Who am I talking to?
Who's there?
You assume I "chose my audience" for something specific.
What do you think I'm doing?
It isn't an assumption, but the odds are in my favor.
It takes more to impress me than a mystery voice.
You really don't scare me.
Then maybe you can entertain me after all.
Good luck getting your prisoners to work together. We'll speak again.
